name: IWECT 2017 : 2017 International Workshop on Energy Conservation Technologies
content: 2017 International Workshop on Energy Conservation Technologies (IWECT 2017)--CFP October 19-22, 2017|Shanghai, China Website：http://www.iwect.org/ 2017 International Workshop on Energy Conservation Technologies (IWECT 2017). IWECT 2017 is organized by APISE. The conference will be held in Shanghai, China from 19 to 22 October, 2017 !We sincerely invite all the researchers, scholars, engineers, students and people are in interested in these areas to take part in IWECT 2017\. ●Publishing & Indexing All the accepted papers will be included in the conference proceeding, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, INSPEC and other databases. ●Topics Energy Conservation Technologies ●Paper Submission 1, If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us： iwect@apise.org. 2, Contributions must be written in English and report on original, unpublished work not submitted for publication elsewhere. Submissions not adhering to the above specified constraints may be rejected without review. ●Contact Us Ms. Suzy Shih Email: iwect@apise.org Tel:+852-30506939( Hong Kong)
